title: Does Nexus Blitz seem to have the same problems as URF to anyone else?
body:
I've played about 16 games of it now and have lost a large majority. To me it feels like you'll be pretty happy with your team comp, but then you see the enemies and they always have something just as broken or more broken as you. 

Anyone else getting this or is it just me?

replies.body: i think the matchmaking is the main problem
ikr. And as soon as someone dies the enemy just starts to snowball and it becomes a completely one sided and un fun gamemode to play
